title: DARKNESS ROLLER COASTER VR
summary: Enjoy to be scared in this Amazing attraction on VR Cardboard headset  !
description: Special offer ! 50% off !Not a simply Rollercoaster, an Amazing attraction ! Live a fantastic moment in this Darkness Roller Coaster ! Win another VR  app by searching all hidden animation !Choose your way and go through cave in adventure world or dive into magical path worthy dark fairy tales...More than 7 minutes of sensations !With DARKNESS ROLLERCOASTER, enjoy to be scared !NO CONTROLLER NEEDED !Compatible with all VR Headset : - Cardboard- Virtual Vizor- Homido- FreeFly- VRBox....TIPS : For have the better result, please follow this some rule1/ Be sure you have enought Space for Download the App (200 Mo)+2/ Be sure you don't run too many app at the same time for have 500 RAM available.3/ If you have a double vision issue please scan a QR Code here : http://www.hypergridbusiness.com/faq/vr-headset-qr-codes/4/ For samsung Gear VR please donwload this app before : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.kunkunsoft.cardboardappforgearvrNo Work on MOTO G but it's excellent on MOTO X !
descriptionHTML:
Special offer ! 50% off !

Not a simply Rollercoaster, an Amazing attraction !

Live a fantastic moment in this Darkness Roller Coaster !

Win another VR app by searching all hidden animation !

Choose your way and go through cave in adventure world or dive into magical path worthy dark fairy tales...

More than 7 minutes of sensations !


With DARKNESS ROLLERCOASTER, enjoy to be scared !

NO CONTROLLER NEEDED !

Compatible with all VR Headset :
- Cardboard
- Virtual Vizor
- Homido
- FreeFly
- VRBox
....

TIPS : For have the better result, please follow this some rule
1/ Be sure you have enought Space for Download the App (200 Mo)+
2/ Be sure you don't run too many app at the same time for have 500 RAM available.
3/ If you have a double vision issue please scan a QR Code here : http://www.hypergridbusiness.com/faq/vr-headset-qr-codes/
4/ For samsung Gear VR please donwload this app before : https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.kunkunsoft.cardboardappforgearvr

No Work on MOTO G but it's excellent on MOTO X !
comments: Bloody brilliant, fluent and very detailed graphics, the audio is superb if using high end system or bud earphones, yes very worth downloading!!!
View is severely blurred. Can't fix it.
just perfect, we can see there is a lot of work on this app; it's smooth try with a LG G4) and  really nice looking, worth buying it
I think this game is totally awesome.  The best yet, that I've seen other than the VR games on the gear!! Ha job,  totally worth the download.
Nice apps totally worth buy it. Don't forget to turn at your back when your ride the roller coaster.  Hahaha
recentChanges: Slow the time by pressing button
